Array.text: Select the desired crop and <color=#00B0F0>drag</color> it over the fields to plant multiple crops!
If battery usage is high, turn on the <color=#00B0F0>Heat Reduction</color> feature in settings!
Placing a relic (treasure) with <color=#00B0F0>the same type of effect</color> increases stats only up to the <color=#00B0F0>maximum cumulative value</color>.
